interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Lip MOISTURIZER by MERLOTSPF15 - Intense Therapy Lip Moisturizer - Grape Seed Infused - for Healing Dry, Chapped Lips. Made with Beeswax, Coconut Oil, Vitamin E - Color FreeSPF 15
Review Date: 2020/02/12
Store: Merlot
Average Rating: 3.4
Product Details: {'Package Dimensions': '2.71 x 1.57 x 0.59 inches; 0.32 Ounces'}
Review Text: This is a very nice lip moisturizer.  It goes on clear and softens and moisturizes your lips.  There is no scent or flavoring.  The moisturizer provides sun protection.
Review Title: Leaves lips soft and protected from the sun
Rating: 4.0

reference_summary:
Body Scrubs for Women Premium Organic Nimiah Exfoliating Body Scrub with Activated Bamboo Charcoal Natural Salt Exfoliator Scrubs for Body Foot Hand Skin Care Nimiah {'Brand': 'Nimiah', 'Skin Type': 'Acne Prone', 'Product Benefits': 'Exfoliating', 'Material Feature': 'Certified Organic', 'Use for': 'Hands, Whole Body', 'Package Dimensions': '2.7 x 2.7 x 2.1 inches; 5.61 Ounces', 'UPC': '192242919810'} Pros:

*The scrub is really good at exfoliating skin;
*After a week of daily use of this scrub, my skin is noticeably softer and brighter;
*It is kind of fun to use because it feels/looks like you are rubbing dirt all over your body;
*The jar is small but a little goes a long way.

Cons:
*The charcoal scrub is a bit messy if you are not careful. I have to quickly rinse my shower after each use because the stuff has flicked everywhere. Great scrub Way Of Will Sweet Orange Body Wash, Moisturizing Body Wash with Sweet Orange Essential Oil, Body Wash for Women and Men, Paraben and Sulfate Free, 120 mL Way Of Will {'Item Form': 'Oil', 'Skin Type': 'Oily,All Skin Types', 'Brand': 'Way Of Will', 'Scent': 'Sweet Orange', 'Material Type Free': 'Paraben,Sulfate Free', 'Product Dimensions': '6 x 1.5 x 1.5 inches; 4 Ounces', 'UPC': '840652000191'} (Reviewed by my wife): I did not expect to like this sweet orange essential oil body wash (It's orange!). It smells heavenly. The scent is a mood lifter as described. The body wash leaves my skin soft and smooth.

The bottle is surprisingly small, but a little goes a long way. Orange scent is heavenly Splendora Sugar Lip Scrub - Peach - (20g / 0.7oz.) Splendora {'Brand': 'Splendora', 'Skin Type': 'Dry', 'Product Benefits': 'Exfoliating', 'Material Feature': 'Certified Organic', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Package Dimensions': '1.73 x 1.73 x 1.34 inches; 0.7 Ounces', 'UPC': '736640550444'} (Reviewed by my wife): This lip scrub smells great and tastes great. You are supposed to rinse off the scrub after rubbing it in, but it tasted so good that I found myself licking the peachy sugar off. The directions are very simple, just put a bit of scrub on your lips and rub them in for about 30 seconds, then rinse off. My lips are visibly smoother after using this product. The jar is small, but a little goes a long way so I'll be making this last. Smells great, tastes great Lip MOISTURIZER by MERLOTSPF15 - Intense Therapy Lip Moisturizer - Grape Seed Infused - for Healing Dry, Chapped Lips. Made with Beeswax, Coconut Oil, Vitamin E - Color FreeSPF 15 Merlot {'Package Dimensions': '2.71 x 1.57 x 0.59 inches; 0.32 Ounces'} This is a very nice lip moisturizer. It goes on clear and softens and moisturizes your lips. There is no scent or flavoring. The moisturizer provides sun protection. Leaves lips soft and protected from the sun
profile:
**User Profile Summary Update:**

The user continues to emphasize body care, particularly in the realm of effective exfoliation and moisturizing solutions, with a recent focus on lip care. They are now actively seeking products designed for healing dry, chapped lips, reinforcing their broader approach to skincare that accommodates specific needs.

Interest in products that are suitable for dry skin remains strong, and the user values organic materials and certified ingredients, maintaining a consistent preference for natural formulations. While they appreciate products that typically enhance sensory experiences, the latest interaction highlighted a product that is free of scent or flavoring; this indicates a possible openness to simplicity when the effectiveness is clearly established.

The user places significant importance on the functionality of products, particularly those that offer protection, as seen in their recent choices. They continue to prioritize products that visibly improve texture and comfort, valuing efficient and practical solutions that deliver maximum results from minimal application. 

Overall, the user seeks user-friendly, effective skincare solutions that accommodate their specific needs while still appreciating tactile and practical experiences in their skincare routine. Their preference for enjoyable applications continues, but there is a noted flexibility towards products that emphasize functionality over sensory appeal when warranted.
